attributes.caption: There are days when some people just simply don't want to be in the Clip of the Week.  Those days are done.
attributes.description: There are days when some people just simply don't want to be in the Clip of the Week. Those days are done.
attributes.display_title: Clip of the Week - Winners Don't Use Drugs

attributes.title: Clip of the Week - Going To Tokyo
attributes.caption:
We're pretty jealous of the adventures in Japan that Craig, Chad, and Bryan are having right now.  Jealous enough that we'll do just about anything to get there.  Just.  About.  Anything.
See Bryan, Chad, and Cheapy
attributes.description: We're pretty jealous of the adventures in Japan that Craig, Chad, and Bryan are having right now. Jealous enough that we'll do just about anything to get there. Just. About. Anything.
attributes.display_title: Clip of the Week - Going To Tokyo

attributes.title: Clip of the Week - Craig's Broken Promise
attributes.caption: Craig swore he would bring each of us the ultimate Japanese souvenirs: mail-order brides.
attributes.description: Craig swore he would bring each of us the ultimate Japanese souvenirs: mail-order brides.
attributes.display_title: Clip of the Week - Craig's Broken Promise

attributes.title: The Clip - Re-Debuting Soon!
attributes.caption:
We interrupt your regularly-scheduled Clip of the Week to inform you that it's currently under maintenance...
In the future, look forward to sketches that have a bit more "oomph" to them by upping the
attributes.description: We interrupt your regularly-scheduled Clip of the Week to inform you that it's currently under maintenance...In the future, look forward to sketches that have a bit more "oomph" to them by upping their production values. Putting this much awesomeness into them will mean breaking the trend of a video every single week, but the things we've already got cooking up will all be worth it!Any questions?
attributes.display_title: The Clip - Re-Debuting Soon!

attributes.title: The Clip - The Total Destruction (feat. brentalfloss)
attributes.caption:
Bryan knows the pain of every Q player; when you try forcing your opponent into performing a sex act, it very seldom works out in your favor.
Special thanks to brentalfloss for h
attributes.description: Bryan knows the pain of every Q player; when you try forcing your opponent into performing a sex act, it very seldom works out in your favor.Special thanks to brentalfloss for help with the lyrics and his vocal talent!Special thanks to Heart Strings Cosplay and Bunny Ayumi for Ibuki and Sakura!
attributes.display_title: The Clip - The Total Destruction (feat. brentalfloss)

attributes.title: The Clip - ScrewAttack's Gone Broke
attributes.caption:
When Craig marks the most important day in ScrewAttack's life by making a substantial investment in a totally legitimate African mining corporation, there's only one solution to solving our financial woes...
 
Follow ScrewA
attributes.description: When Craig marks the most important day in ScrewAttack's life by making a substantial investment in a totally legitimate African mining corporation, there's only one solution to solving our financial woes...
attributes.display_title: The Clip - ScrewAttack's Gone Broke

attributes.title: The Clip - Teasers
attributes.caption:
EA and DICE recently began dropping teasers for Battlefield 4 that are rather... minimalistic.  Why didn't we think of that sooner?
 
Nick is sociable!
attributes.description: EA and DICE recently began dropping teasers for Battlefield 4 that are rather... minimalistic. Why didn't we think of that sooner?
attributes.display_title: The Clip - Teasers

attributes.title: The Clip - Slapman Needs A Job
attributes.caption: SLAP Energy, the company Slapman represents, closed up shop recently.  When a man's only talent is slapping the everloving crap out of things, where else can he find employment?
attributes.description: SLAP Energy, the company Slapman represents, closed up shop recently. When a man's only talent is slapping the everloving crap out of things, where else can he find employment?
attributes.display_title: The Clip - Slapman Needs A Job

attributes.title: Clip of the Week - Contra
attributes.caption: Life lesson: Never throw instruction manuals at Jose, it doesn't end well.
attributes.description: Life lesson: Never throw instruction manuals at Jose, it doesn't end well.

attributes.title: The Clip - Sister Sites
attributes.caption: ScrewAttack.com: gradually becoming a porn site with every passing day.

attributes.title: The Clip - Honest Wii U Ad

attributes.title: The Clip - Don't Tell Ben About Star Wars
attributes.caption: For health and safety reasons... please, PLEASE don't tell Ben about new Star Wars games.  We beg of you.
attributes.description: For health and safety reasons... please, PLEASE don't tell Ben about new Star Wars games. We beg of you.

attributes.title: The Clip - Post-SGC Disorder
attributes.caption: We took pictures.  We signed autographs.  We fought Mike Tyson.  And now, we can't stop doing any of it.  ... Wait, then who's typing this description?
attributes.description: We took pictures. We signed autographs. We fought Mike Tyson. And now, we can't stop doing any of it. ... Wait, then who's typing this description?

attributes.title: The Clip - A Guide To Comments On The Internet

attributes.title: The Clip - Crap On Your Competition

attributes.title: The Clip - Watch_Dawg
attributes.caption: In Watch_Dogs, Chicago may be seeing the problem with having a whole city run on a single interconnected network, but it's possible to have a bigger problem in an area as small as our own HQ...
attributes.description: In Watch_Dogs, Chicago may be seeing the problem with having a whole city run on a single interconnected network, but it's possible to have a bigger problem in an area as small as our own HQ...
